name: Calibre Device Data File
summary: Learn about .CALIBRE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Common CALIBRE files include driveinfo.calibre and metadata.calibre. If you delete these files, Calibre will recreate them the next time the device is synchronized.

description: Data file generated by Calibre eBook management software; written by the Calibre software onto an attached eReader device (e.g., Kindle, NOOK) when it is connected to the computer; contains information that helps Calibre manage eBook information on the device.
